items.sentence: There are lots of other things we should be doing.
I've already done most of what I have to do today.
Tom and I were suspended from school for fighting.
Tom usually weeds his garden early in the morning.
Tom can make friends easily no matter where he is.
When Tom saw Mary and John together, he was angry.
Tom wasn't able to get the cork out of the bottle.
Tom used the screwdriver to clean his fingernails.
Tom turned around to see if he was being followed.
Tom told me his father had been killed in the war.
